sentences.sentence: The main cause of failure is foreseeing the unforeseeable game results.
sentences.translation: 失败的主要原因是提前预测了不可预测的博弈结果。

sentences.sentence: Forbearance made after foreseeing tragedy is morality; competition made before foreseeing victory is game.
sentences.translation: 优先预测悲剧后作出的忍让是道德，优先预测胜利前作出的竞争是博弈。

sentences.sentence: He was also proved largely right in foreseeing the severity of the recession that came later under Margaret Thatcher.
sentences.translation: 对后来撒切尔夫人时期严重经济衰退的预计，也被证明是大体上正确的。
